client
Class Job

java.lang.Object
  client.Job
Direct Known Subclasses:
TspJob
public abstract class Job
extends java.lang.Object

Interface that defines a job to be executed remotely.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam

Constructor Detail

Job

Method Detail

executeJob

public abstract void executeJob(Client2Space space)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Executes the job in a compute space represented internally by a Task object. Collects the result returned by the compute space and stores them.

Parameters:
space - Compute space to which Task objects should be sent for execution
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - If the compute space throws RemoteException while writing tasks or reading results, then the exception is in turn thrown by this method

getAllResults

public abstract java.lang.Object getAllResults()
Transforms values returned by Result object into something relevant to the subclass implementing this interface.

Returns:
A container with values from all Result objects
